name: BuggedBug ( Wowie Jam 2.0)
description:
BuggedBug is a short Wowie 2.0 gamejam game about a glitchy Fly. 

(the glitched out wings will change its flying - behaviour)

The theme of the jam was "Intentional Bugs".

Collect all the poop as fast as possible.

You can post your best time in the comments for everyone to compare.
